thread.title: West Fairlee man cited for DUI #6
thread.title_full: West Fairlee man cited for DUI #6 - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: West Fairlee man cited for DUI #6
text:
BRADFORD, Vt. - A West Fairlee man is facing his 6th DUI charge.
Police say over the weekend Jesse Cray was parked on Old Post Road in Bradford. When troopers approached the car, Cray then allegedly started driving. Police were able to pull the 53-year-old over. They say he was driving drunk with a criminally suspended license. He's due in court in November.
